about.details:
Founded in 2017, Aspire & Innovative Advertising Limited deals in consumer durables, including kitchen appliances, home appliances, white goods, mobile phones and accessories, solar products, and more. They deal in products from renowned brands such as Bajaj, Prestige, Vivo, Samsung, Crompton, Whirlpool, Hindware, Havells, and many others.

The company's asset-light model incurs expenses for facilitation fees and commission paid to intermediaries. They provide services such as marketing, field staff interaction, demand collation, and financial services to customers in rural and semi-urban communities.

The company offers 50+ products, including cookware, electronics, and appliances such as pressure cookers, induction cooktops, mixer-grinders, dinner sets, sewing machines, fans, irons, bulbs, heaters, phones, TVs, refrigerators, washing machines, headphones, and solar lanterns.

The company has commercial arrangements with 15+ intermediaries and operates 19 warehouses in 16 states.

As of November 30, 2023, the company has 49 full-time employees, including managers.

faqs.question: What is the Aspire & Innovative IPO?
faqs.answer:
Aspire & Innovative IPO is a SME IPO of 4068000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹21.97 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹54 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on March 26, 2024, and closes on March 28, 2024.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Aspire & Innovative IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Aspire & Innovative IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Aspire & Innovative IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Aspire & Innovative IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Aspire & Innovative IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Aspire & Innovative IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Aspire & Innovative IPO opens on March 26, 2024 and closes on March 28, 2024.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Aspire & Innovative IPO?
faqs.answer: Aspire & Innovative IPO lot size is 2000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,08,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Aspire & Innovative IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Aspire & Innovative IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Aspire & Innovative IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Aspire & Innovative IPO will be done on Monday, April 1, 2024, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, April 2, 2024. Check the Aspire & Innovative IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Aspire & Innovative IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Aspire & Innovative IPO listing date is on Wednesday, April 3, 2024.
